Package dev.kkorolyov.killstreek.item

Class Equippable

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.killstreek.item.Item
      • dev.kkorolyov.killstreek.item.Equippable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Armor, Weapon

    public abstract class Equippable
extends Item
    An item attachable to an equipment slot. Has durability and breaks after enough uses.
